Name: Nine-20-Seven
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and lightly stir.
Review: Champagne with a hint of vanilla.
History: Created in 2002 by Damien Caldwell at Home Bar, London, England. Damian was lost for a name until a customer asked for the time.
Nutrition: One serving of Nine-20-Seven contains 34 calories
